interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: OULAC Shine to Shine Velvet Matte Lipstick, Long Lasting Creamy Formula, Opaque Finish, Vegan Friendly, 3.6 grams / 0.12 ounces, Cranberries (Y09)
Review Date: 2021/12/08
Store: Oulac
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Oulac', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Finish Type': 'Matte,Velvet', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Shine', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '3.9 x 0.68 x 0.68 inches; 1.23 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'velvet-matte-Y09'}
Review Text: it felt like a mix between lipstick and lip gloss. It went on smooth and felt light. It stayed on through most of my morning work routine. It came off just a little bit on the cup after drinking. I loved the color I picked and it comes in various other colors. I'll probably order a few more and drop them in the stockings.
Review Title: pretty color
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Beuaty Star 3PCS Poly Nail Gel Kit 30ml, Extension Gel Trial Kit Nail Enhancement Builder Gel Professional Nail Gel All-in One with with Base Top Coat
Beauty Star
{'Brand': 'Beauty Star', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Unit Count': '144.0 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '10.7 x 9.2 x 1.7 inches; 1.15 Pounds'}
The product took a bit of extra time to finally get to me. In general, together is a good set.  A couple of things annoyed me. First, the nails - the poly forms, were fine but the case they're in not numbered and the nail themselves are numbered but so tiny it's very hard to make out. Also, the container be VERY careful it doesn't close well if dropped with the way their numbered it was hard to put them back in their home slots. The poly gel- very very tacky, I get it supposed to be but it made it a bit messy from the tube to the spatula, to the nail. The company did warm about the gel in the turn and working with it in cooler temperatures.  In the few kits I've received from the Vine program it was the only one with a tool/brush so yay!! overall a good product and kit to use.
good for beginners
Pine Gel Nail Polish Set 6 Colors Purple Blue Cat Eye Glitter Gel Polish 7.5 ml Soak Off UV LED Cure Home Salon Manicure
pine
{'Brand': 'Pine', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '9.524 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Liquid Volume': '0.25 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '4.84 x 2.87 x 3.58 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.87 x 3.58 inches; 9.77 Ounces', 'UPC': '738628890955'}
I used the darker cat's eye recently on a family member's hands, she loved it. A base, 2 thin coats, and a topcoat. UV light and was perfect. The bottles are small and come in 6 colors.  I think it would be good for the girl that has a kit already started or a shop. Great stocking stuffer. Oh, I didn't pick up on the "light" pine scent.  I'd order again.
beautiful colors
BELLA MODA Sponges Blender Puff for Powder, Liquid and Cream Makeup 4PCS Purple Beauty Blending Sponge Foundations Powders Wet and Dry Used
BELLA MODA
{'Brand': 'BELLA MODA', 'Color': 'Purple', 'Material': 'Sponge', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Face Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '5.8 x 2.9 x 2.9 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '823544676230'}
I used these a couple of different ways to take makeup off and put a moisturizer on my face, kinda soaked up into the sponge but if yeah it worked, and then just rinse out in warm soapy water. I also used it to blot polish on my nails, it gives it a cool effect. (didn't use the whole sponge) of course, came in a few different colors. Yeah I liked it enough to order again.
many uses
Yolife Acrylic Nail Brush with100% Pure Kolinsky Sable, Nail Art Brush With Brilliant crystal Handle, for Manicure Pedicure (6#, Silver)
YOLIFE
{'Color': 'Silver', 'Brand': 'YOLIFE', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.75 x 2 x 0.3 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
If you do nails at home or professionally you can never have enough brushes and this comes in a set of four. Each has a different tip and one of the four has a tiny ball on the end. All of them can be used for various things, polishing drawing ect... very pretty with crystal handles that is easy to hold. I like this and see myself reordering.
wonderful tools
Atmos Skin Deep Cleansing Mask   All Natural Peel Off Face Mask for Blackheads & Whiteheads, Acne & Pore Remover, Blackhead Mask Remover for Face
Atmos Skin
{'Brand': 'Atmos Skin', 'Product Benefits': 'Cleansing', 'Scent': 'Peel Off', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '5.43 x 3.35 x 1.73 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '812280016097', 'Manufacturer': 'ATMOS SKIN'}
I always like trying out new products. I'm usually leery trying products for my face, this cleansing mask worked, but dried out my face more than I liked, almost an itchy dry. I put on moisturizer right after rinsing the mask off with warm water. It was fine, just not sure I'd order it again.
not a fav of mine
8 Color Colored Liquid Eyeliner Colorful Pen Set,Neon Green Purple White Blue Black Rainbow Colorful Matte Liquid Eyeliner Set Eye Liners for Women Waterproof Pencil delineadores de colores para ojos
evpct
{'Product Dimensions': '6.85 x 5.28 x 0.63 inches; 4.66 Ounces'}
I loved the colors and the bottle the liner was in. It is small and compact doesn't take up a lot of room. Good for your purse or desk drawer. It went on smooth, of course, wet it didn't "dry" as quick as liked but then I've never been good at putting liquid eyeliner on. I gave the set to my daughter and she loved it and wears it I'm sure every day. She said it was easy to remove and she really liked the ease of the applicator.
wet and don't blink

profile:
### Updated User Profile Summary

**Keywords:** Nail Enhancement, Gel Products, Makeup Tools, Lip Products, Beginner Friendly, Product Usability, Delivery Delays, Attention to Detail, Color Variety, Scent Sensitivity, Skincare Caution, Eye Makeup Exploration

**Preferences & Trends:**
- **Nail and Makeup Care Focus:** The user is actively engaged with gel-based nail enhancements and a diverse range of makeup tools, reinforcing a keen interest in both aesthetically pleasing and functional beauty products.
- **Beginner Orientation:** They continue to seek beginner-friendly options, highlighting a preference for products that simplify application while enhancing beauty routines.
- **Attention to Detail:** Quality and usability are vital, with a notable interest in well-designed products that provide ease of use.
- **Delivery Experience:** Timely and reliable delivery remains a top priority for satisfactory purchasing experiences.
- **Color Preferences:** The user enjoys a wide array of colors, showcasing creativity in makeup and nail application, with recent attention to vibrant lip shades.
- **Scent Sensitivity:** A preference for gentle fragrances is apparent, indicating sensitivity to strong scents in beauty products. 
- **Skincare Caution:** Cautious about skincare, they prioritize moisturizing and are deliberate when trying new items, reflecting a thoughtful approach to beauty.
- **Eye Makeup Exploration:** An ongoing interest in colorful eye makeup is evident, particularly with a focus on easy application.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** The user appreciates functionality and aesthetics, enjoying the exploration of new beauty products that balance quality, versatility, and user-friendly features.
